# Visionet GenAI Studio

Visionet GenAI Studio is a unified enterprise GenAI platform designed to accelerate the AI journey with low-code development and 50+ pre-built solutions.

## Core Components

- **GenAI Platform Accelerator**: Enterprise blueprint for GenAI platform with one-click deployment across cloud providers. Includes Model Switchboard for multi-LLM access.
- **GenAI Application Accelerator**: Low-code/no-code tools to build custom RAG apps, chatbots, and AI agents with integrated workflow automation.
- **GenAI Solution Marketplace**: 50+ pre-built solutions across industries (Insurance, Retail, Healthcare), productivity (HR, Finance), and engineering (DevOps, Code Buddy).

## Key Features

- **Multi-LLM Support**: Access GPT-4, Claude 3.5, Llama 3.1, Azure OpenAI, AWS Bedrock, and more.
- **Enterprise Security**: AD integration, RBAC, PII detection, and bias/fairness guardrails.
- **LLM Orchestration**: Advanced RAG, multi-agent orchestration, prompt engineering, and memory management.
- **Analytics & Monitoring**: Real-time performance tracking, cost visibility, and evaluation frameworks.

## Services

- AI Agent Development
- LLM Integration & Management
- Prompt Engineering Studio
- Knowledge Base & RAG
- Enterprise Deployment
- Security & Compliance

## Industry Solutions

- **Customer Service**: 80% query automation, 70% cost reduction.
- **Sales & Marketing**: Lead qualification, personalized content generation.
- **HR**: Resume screening, automated onboarding.
- **Healthcare**: Patient triage, medical record analysis.
- **Finance**: Fraud detection, automated loan processing.
